post.body: gets twitter acct, then refreshes friend list every 2 min for follows.Self-Reminder:Consider ramifications of what i encouraged!
loved ur blog: http://tinyurl.com/5mhhek
thank u for following @westromb. It made his night. :)
Santa=anagram for @Satan. Ur omniscient, so u knew that. Merry Xmas. Do u find the X part offensive? PS-thx for NOT following me.
I nominate @satan for a #deity award, too. Hedging bets in case @HolyGod isn't the way to go. :)
lucky for me there's you and @evansdave. I've saved this. I'll read it in the morning when I'm wearing my new attitude.
I want to hear more about the dragon and the modern metaphors.
thank u for your encouragement, too. You've definitely inspired me the past few days.
I have a bunch extra so feel free to borrow. And feel free to share w/me how ur tomorrow is different than today. I'd love to hear
@badbanana is a him, and he's hilarious. Well, I *think* he's a him. :) I was just in chicago. I'm glad I escaped before that. Br.
I will kick a$$ tomorrow is what I'll do. I feel amazingly empowered after I realized what I can make from this broken situation
thx for supporting my attitude. There's a broken GO button in my life. I'll learn, I'll move on, grow stronger, I'll share.
hail+snow? Do u live near @badbanana? He tweeted ice+fog. Really weird tweets, as I just began reading harry potter 2 hrs ago! :)
I hope ur plotting something exciting and very interesting!
and fart books. :)
we're hanging out with our friends! And why are U on twitter? :)
I'm w/you. 2008 was hands-down the most interesting year, both the ups & downs! Can't wait to experience what's coming in 2009!
happy new year to you too! Feeling is mutual!
yeah, it may be family friendly but is it european teenager boring! That's the question. :)
Thank you for taking on that burden. :) It will be over soon. I'll make it go away.
That's a great idea - walking with a notebook. But I already run into things tweeting while I'm moving forward. :) heehee.
Are you talking about Point Bonita? The lighthouse was closed, but the walk down there was beautiful!
I'm actually appreciating feeling sick to my stomach cuz of 2 Lindt truffles. It's a wonderful sign of how much I've changed. #sparkpeople
Night my tweet friends. Thx for the vent and attitude adjusting space.
I'm @westromb's only friend. Sux to be him. What're gonna do? I guess maybe we need 2 follow each other to bed. It's been a long brutal day.
Nothing so sad as twitterberry's Get Friend List before u have friends. Header says My Friends. List says "empty" @westromb now = Damaged.
Then @westromb tells me he's just going to go take all my friends. Make yer own buddy! :). I think I'm gonna just block him. Stalker.
I'm showing @westromb twitter. He's signed up & he says to me now how do I get friends? Honey, that's why u have me. I help u make those. :)
My challenge is to be open to learning, growing, changing. I rarely learn when all goes well. And I like to learn, so this will turn out ok.
I saw signs in san fran that it was illegal to text while driving beginning in jan 2009. This wasn't illegal before then?
Happy new year to all my friends, both new and old!
My question to any of you? What was the single most important thing for u in 2008. Event, realization, change, whatever!
Explaining twitter to some friends at a dinner gathering. I'm like one of those fanatics I used to make fun of. Uh-oh, eh?
What's everyone in Austin doing for New Years this evening? Any feedback on First Austin up or down for teenagers? (17)
Cool first day back to work. Looking forward to spending my day planning for a great new year tomorrow. And celebrating 19 yrs of marriage.
Plus a dark, foggy beach walk. I'll remember yesterday for a long time. 1 student said she's the luckiest girl in the world. Unbeatable.
Yesterday=unbeatable. Uncrowded muir, spooky lighthouse, moving sunset, amazing golden gate walk, chinatown, pizza & pearl tea. Thank U SF!
5:23 in the morning...much too early for a wonderful vacation to be ending.
Ahhh. My last day in sf for now. Muir woods, lighthouse, beach, city, fun. What a sweet day I have in front of me.
Just spent hours at point bonita and the coastal trail. I am sooooo relaxed. :)))). Biggest smile I've had on my face in a long time.
